TextView.android:text: Section A: Personal details
3. Height(cm)?
6. Years of schooling?
7. No. of family members?
Section B: Work Characteristics
1. How long have you been working?
2. How long have you been doing your present type of work?
3. How many hours do you spend per day on your occupation?
4. How many days per week are you engaged in your occupation?
Section C: Work place assessment
1. How long you stand/walk on a day?
2. How do you reach the work place?
3. Average distance between workplace and current residance?
4. What kind of soil are you working on?
5. The effect of different risk factors associated with your job on a scale of 0-5?
6. How often do you fell mentally exhausted after work?
7. How often are you physically exhausted after work?
Section D: Repeated Activity
1. Are you engaged in repetitive tasks throughout the day?
2. How long do you do a particular activity continuosly?
3. Between the work, how long do you rest in total?
4. The difficulty of daily activities associated with your job on a scale of 0-6?
Working with hand hoe
Working with pickaxe
Working with shovel
Working with machette
Working with crowbar
Manual material handling
Section E: Lifestyle
1. Do you take breakfast before going to work?
2. Do you take lunch before going to work?
3. Do you have the habit of using any kinds of tobacco products?
Section F: Musculoskeletal discomfort
1. Have you had any problems previously?
2. Have you had any pain or discomfort during the last 12 months that you believe is related to your work?
For each body part indicate how often you experience pain
Body part
1-7 days
8-30 days
More than\n 30 days
Upper back
Lower back
3. For each body part indicate the pain on a scale of 0-5
Upper back
Lower back
Section G: Post injury survey
1. Has any type of injury occured?
2. What activity were you doing when you got injured?

RadioButton.android:text: Maintaining a position for a long time
Working in an awkward or cramped position
Responding to unanticipated or sudden movement

TextView.android:text: 3.Did you officialy report the injury?
4. Did you see a physician for the injury?
5. Did you lose half a day or more of work as a resut of the injury?
6. Have you limited your working time as a result of the injury?
7. Have you limited your area of practice to avoid sustaining another injury?
8. What kind of treatment was applied?
9. Have your symptoms been made worse after treatement?
If yes, what activity caused your symptoms to reccur?

RadioButton.android:text: Maintaining a position for a long time
Working in an awkward or cramped position

TextView.android:text: 10. Has the injury caused you to alter your work habits?
If yes, what activity do you do differently?

RadioButton.android:text: Increase working time for same output
Stop working when hurt or when symptoms occur
Take more rest breaks or pauses during the workday

TextView.android:text: 11. Are you considering changing jobs because of injury or because you fear another injury?
